title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', now it changes with settings.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it changes with settings. Description: The title of the hyperlink builder is currently changing with the settings. Steps to reproduce: 1. Click on 'OK' and then reopen the hyperlink builder. Actual result: The title of the hyperlink builder becomes 'www.actuate.com'. Expected result: The title of the hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options'.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Click on 'OK' and then reopen the hyperlink builder.
